issue.title: [Java] Allow for expanding underlying buffer size after allocation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-815](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-815). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are currently some `reAlloc` methods, but not exposed at the vector level. Would be useful to expose them to allow for growing vector capacity without losing current data.
